CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 26, 1941, pg. 18, reads: "Peggy Ann Tadom, young lady with the big cake, celebrated her birthday recently and was honored by a host of her young friends in her home at 101 Jefferson Street. Picture shows the happy youngsters closing in on charming little Peggy just before the wild dash for a bit of the cake. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of children, including Peggy Ann Tadom wearing pineapple patterned skirt seated in center birthday cake with nine candles in lap, posed in her home with light colored dot patterned curtains, striped rug, and portrait of baby on wall, 101 Jefferson Street, another version
